newValue.text: Write unit tests for complex PnL and Risk/Reward calculations in src/lib/calculations.ts
Write integration tests for CRUD operations in src/lib/actions/trades.ts

snapshot.title: Improve Test Coverage for Server Actions and Utilities
snapshot.description: Complex PnL and Risk/Reward calculations and critical CRUD server actions in src/lib/calculations.ts and src/lib/actions/trades.ts lack test coverage. Add required unit tests.
